I selected non-contiguous children of a package in the Java Browsing
Perspective. Right-click Team/Update and got the error. None of the local files
were dirty. If it matters, the changes incomming were all 2003 to 2004 changes
in comments. See screenshot for selection.

Created an attachment (id=7333)
Screen shot of fancy selection.
What Eclipse build are you using?

Appears to be a duplicate of bug 43386. Was there any side effects or did you 
just notice the bug in the log?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 43386 ***
A dialog poped up with the message, I did not notice anything else.
